arts.ttl: Lethal Lewandowski downs spirited Celta to boost Barcelona title hopes
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski inspired Hansi Flick's Barcelona to a 4-2 La Liga victory over Celta Vigo at Estadio Abanca-Balaidos on Sunday, heating up the title race.

arts.ttl: Barcelona Player Ratings vs. Celta Vigo: Lethal Attacking Display Closes Gap to Real Madrid
arts.sum: Barcelona are now just three points behind Real Madrid in the La Liga title race.

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford leading all of La Liga in one stat after Barcelona’s win over Celta Vigo
arts.sum: Barcelona star Marcus Rashford has taken his place atop the La Liga assist chart, following the Blaugrana’s latest outing. This comes after the Englishman laid on another pair of goals…

arts.ttl: Lewandowski 10, Rashford 9.0 | Celta Vigo 2-4 FC Barcelona: Player ratings
arts.sum: Despite some bizarre refereeing decisions, FC Barcelona come out victorious against Celta Vigo. A massive win for La Blaugrana, as they manage to win all three points at a stadium that has always been a tough place to visit. arts.ttl: Lewandowski 10, De Jong 8.5 | Celta Vigo 2-4 Barcelona: Player ratings
arts.sum: Barcelona closed the gap with Real Madrid to just three points, taking full advantage of Los Blancos’ slip-up earlier in the day, as they beat Celta Vigo comprehensively at the Balaidos. arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona starting lineup against Celta Vigo | La Liga MD 12
arts.sum: Barcelona have announced their starting eleven heading into their crucial matchup against Celta Vigo at the Balaidos. Coach Hansi Flick has made a few defensive changes from the midweek draw with Olympiacos. While the struggling Wojciech Szczesny continues in goal, Jules Kounde has been replaced by Eric Garcia at right-back.
